name: Zombie Horde Io
description:
Join the Zombie Horde Io server with a group of friends to control, grow, and fight with your own zombie horde.  Use your character's influence radius to organize and fight enemy hordes.  Control both Player and Horde with separate controls.  While you navigate the city, look for "lost" zombies to add to your total (score).    In this inspired Io, use the city terrain and obstacles to use to your benefit.  See you online!

Movement Controls:

Player "WASD" 

Horde "Arrow Keys"
